title: Only Quint Life Steal?
body:
I only just hit lvl 20 and am looking for runes, lifesteal being one of them but there's only a quint for LS. Can you maybe make more LS runes and make some scaling?

Thanks 
DragonHunter out

replies.body: Nah its in the right spot :)
They have done this for a reason as its to strong to have 10%+ lifesteal early if you get Blade

> [{quoted}](name=Mar3thyu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WawjwjiK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-07T04:09:51.004+0000)
>
> They have done this for a reason as its to strong to have 10%+ lifesteal early if you get Blade

Then make it only a scaling type of thing. . .

> [{quoted}](name=Dr4g0n Hunt3r,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WawjwjiK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-08T03:07:21.780+0000)
>
> Then make it only a scaling type of thing. . .

Then we'd just be able to have a heap of lifesteal late game. Nope, its where its at for good reason. With too much lifesteal, characters can be tanky while building only offensive items as long as they auto attack enough.
